sentences.sContent: So what should we do to promote peace, in addition to the proposals mentioned above?
sentences.sContent_eng: So what should we do to promote peace, in addition to the proposals mentioned above?
sentences.sCn: 那么，除了上述提到的方案外，我们应该采取什么行动来促进和平呢？

sentences.sContent: But only wear on perspective glasses to see, or we can't see it, that is why in addition to the players, but not others.
sentences.sContent_eng: But only wear on perspective glasses to see, or we can't see it, that is why in addition to the players, but not others.
sentences.sCn: 但是只有佩戴上透视眼镜才能够看见，要不然是看不到的，这也是为何除了玩家以外，其他人却看不到的原因。
